version_description:
With this new version, we have started to offer annual subscription option along with some bug fixes and performance improvements.
We hope you will use it with pleasure and if you love Phonty please don't forget to rate us on App Store!
We have fixed a few bugs for better performance, just update and enjoy!

We have fixed some issues with this version.
Enjoy using Phonty!

We keep on developing Phonty continuously!
With this new version, we have fixed some issues and updated our platform for performance improvement.
Enjoy using Phonty!

This version includes enhancements on cut-out tool and magic background eraser features.
We are working hard to develop Phonty app every day.
We hope you will enjoy using our new features.

We've made some performance enhancements for a better experience and we have revised our intro screens to present our new features. We hope you will use it with pleasure!
If you love using Phonty, please don't forget to rate us on App Store!
We have fixed a few bugs for better performance, just update and enjoy!

With this version, we have added great features to Phonty that will make it easy to use. You will now be able to easily edit your photos, which are added as both background and layer.

In addition, you can see all the added layers in the new layers menu and change their order, delete or hide them.

Also, we have added many new covering options, and now you can adjust and partially erase them.

Another new feature is that now with a long press on your photo you will be able to see and compare it with the original image.

We hope that you will enjoy using our app and if you like Phonty, we would appreciate if you rate us on the App Store.

With this new version, we have started to offer annual subscription option along with some bug fixes and performance improvements.
We hope you will use it with pleasure and if you love Phonty please don't forget to rate us on App Store!
With this new version we have started to support iOS 13 dark mode. Enjoy using Phonty!

With this new version, we have started to offer 1, 3, 6 monthly subscription options along with some bug fixes and performance improvements.

We hope you will use it with pleasure and if you love Phonty please don't forget to rate us on App Store!
We have fixed a few bugs for better performance, just update and enjoy!
